content.text: Write down the temperature shown by each arrow
Which was the coldest day?

The table shows the daily temperature in Hayville for one week in January
The temperature was recorded again \(8\frac{1}{2}\) hours later
At what time was this temperature recorded?
By this time, the temperature had risen by \(7^{\circ}\mathrm{C}\)
Find this temperature
In Grassington, the temperature recorded at 07:35 was \(-3^{\circ}\mathrm{C}\)
A customer buys 3 shirts, 5 ties and 1 coat
Calculate the total cost
A jacket has a price of $64
Jeff increases this price by \(8\%
Calculate the new price
Jeff also increases the price of a dress from \(\) 250\(to\) \ \(280\)
Calculate the percentage increase in the price of the dress
The shop has a rectangular floor measuring \(5.5\mathrm{m}\) by \(8.5\mathrm{m}\)
The floor covering costs \(12 per square metre
Calculate the cost of the floor covering
Jeff invests $3600 for 3 years at a rate of \(6\%\) per year compound interest
Work out the value of the investment at the end of the 3 years
Jeff owns a clothes shop

A counter is taken at random from each bag
Show that the probability of taking a red counter from bag \(C\) is equal to the probability of taking a red counter from bag \(D\)
